sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘十三，小餘二百五十七；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder thirteen, small remainder two hundred fifty seven;
Large remainder forty one, small remainder eight;
Zhu Li Xie Qiao fifth year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘三十七，小餘一百六十四；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder thirty seven, small remainder one hundred sixty four;
Large remainder forty six, small remainder sixteen;
Shang Heng Dun Tan Jian Zhao first year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘三十一，小餘五百一十二；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder thirty one, small remainder five hundred twelve;

sentences.chinese: 大餘五十一，小餘二十四；
sentences.literal: Large remainder fifty one, small remainder twenty four;
Zhao Yang Zuo E second year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘五十五，小餘四百一十九；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder fifty five, small remainder four hundred nineteen;
Large remainder fifty seven, no small remainder;
Heng Ai Yan Mao third year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘四十九，小餘七百六十七；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder forty nine, small remainder seven hundred sixty seven;
Large remainder two, small remainder eight;
Shang Zhang Da Yuan Xian fourth year.
